name: Astorenium
description:
Setting

Astorenium is a top down shooter game that takes place in an alien planet where a bounty hunter must collect 4 alien artifacts and venture through the dangerous alien planet defeating hostiles. 

Explore the Alien Planet

Fight off the dangerous alien crabs and obstacles along your way. There are lots of enemy wave traps and upgrades to get

Interact with the local NPCs

Find and purchase upgrades along the way. There are is an extra challenge for better weapon

Defeat Dangerous Bosses

There are 2 bosses to defeat along the way

Key Features
  • 1 hour of game play
  • 4 different upgrades
  • 16 bit graphics
  • lots of game dev testing
